name: Courtyard by Marriott Sacramento Airport Natomas

reviews.text: I've stayed at this property twice and each time I've had a clean, quiet, comfortable room. Front desk staff are courteous and helpful, and the rooms are at the upper end of what you would expect for this price/rating level.
reviews.title: Quiet location with great service!

likes.disliked: — Location is a bit out of the way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While some might see the relatively isolated location as a downfall, it certainly makes for a restful night's sleep.
reviews.title: Great place
Fabulous hotel in every way!
reviews.text: This stay took place in the late fall, so the airconditioning wasn't on. However, no noise was associated with the heating. Front desk staff was very helpful. The heated pool and whirlpool were open until 11, and very nice. This property has been renovated, and has a cozy fireplace to sit next to in the lobby. The airport shuttle was quick, efficient, and free. There are several hotels closer to the airport, but this one isn't too far away. No complaints at this property.

Can't say enough nice things about our stay at the Courtyard Natomas! We stayed there August 19-21 as part of a friend's wedding party. The location is great (Nice and secluded, quiet, but within 1 mile of restaurants, gas stations, coffee shops, and fast food establishments). The rooms are clean and well maintained. The staff members are courteous, and quick to respond to requests. Our room had a coffee maker (which is great for those travelers who like to make their own coffee in their rooms). The lobby has a complimentary coffee service from 6-10 AM as well (although the coffee served was weak and dilute). The only suggestion I have for this upscale hotel is that wireless internet access should be standard, not at-cost. Many other hotels lower in standards have complimentary wireless internet access. But other than that, this is a wonderful hotel and we recommend it for travellers on business, leisure, or part of a wedding party.
reviews.title: Nothing went right
A lovely setting
reviews.text: Comfort: The previous reviews stating "noisy air conditioner" are all too

Stayed here just before flying out after a spring break vacation (March 2005). I loved the room... bright, clean, spacious. Hated the air conditioner. We finally turned it off so we could sleep. However, with the air conditioner, the room became hot. The pool was nice and the hot tub was actually hot as opposed to the lukewarm of many hot tubs. The staff was friendly. We enjoyed our dinner at the nearby Blue Gecko (driving distance). Left too early in the morning to experience the breakfast so I can't comment on that. They run a free airport shuttle every half hour which is useful. I would stay here again, but I would check out the air conditioner before I settled into the room and have them move me if it was as bad as the one we had.
reviews.title: Loved the hotel... but noisy air conditioner

reviews.text: This hotel is located in parklike surroundings but only minutes away from downtown Sacramento, Old Sacramento and the airport. That guarantees a very quiet and undisturbed stay as well as quick access to all major destinations. Rooms are pleasantly decorated, staff is friendly and efficient. We did not experience any particular problem with the A/C unit as has been reported by another user. The restaurant is closed on weekends, but most of the time rates are also lower. Highly recommended in its class.
reviews.title: Parklike location near downtown
clean and convenient
reviews.text: Clean and friendly. New hotel so its in really good condition with great towels, sheets and pillows. However, be aware that it's mostly a 'convenient for business' type of hotel, and if you stay there on Friday, Saturday or Sunday the restaurant, bar, etc is all closed. Don't know why, but we were put in a handicap access room. Maybe maid service is also limited on weekends? That said, it's close to the airport, which is why we chose it...

reviews.title: Nice, Clean Mid-Range Hotel
reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel a few different times when traveling to Sacramento on business. It is a clean, comfortable, mid-range hotel.

reviews.title: Take earplugs!
reviews.text: The beds can be a bit on the hard side. The pool area is very nice as well. It is a lesser expensive hotel in a nice central location.

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Sacramento Airport Natomas Hotel Sacramento
description: Stay with us at the Courtyard Sacramento Airport Natomas Hotel and enjoy newly refreshed guestrooms that combine a warm and comfortable environment with productive work space complete with task lighting and ergonomic desk chairs. Other features of our Sacramento Airport hotel include a modern lobby with flexible spaces for our guests, complimentary airport shuttle, free Wi-Fi and easy access to the latest news and weather conditions via our GoBoard(TM). The highlight of our lobby experience, The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. (TM) provides guests with healthy food and beverage offerings in the morning and evening dinner service with cocktails. Guests can also keep fit with a 24-hour fitness center and outdoor pool. Our hotel is ideally situated off I-5 just 10 minutes from Sacramento International Airport and is also near PowerBalance Pavilion and the Sacramento Convention Center. A prime locale and well-appointed hotel facilities make us an excellent choice among Sacramento Airport hotels near Natomas, CA.
